title: Artificial Intelligence and Instructional Design: Creative Problem-Solving Based on Systems Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of foundational curriculum design principles
context.additional_context: Participatory workshop-centered operation through smartphone-based AI tool utilization

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three potential applications of AI tools in instructional design using systems thinking methodologies
Learners can design content production processes utilizing at least three AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Midjourney)
Learners can identify two ethical concerns arising from AI use and propose mitigation strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
